greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle read by rows, T(n, k) for 0 <= k <= n. T(n, 0) = 0^n; T(n, n) = n!; otherwise T(n, k) = (n + 1 - k)*(k - 1)!.
comment: Related to the multinomial that is called M2 in Abramowitz and Stegun, p. 831.
link: M. Abramowitz and I. A. Stegun, eds., Handbook of Mathematical Functions, National Bureau of Standards, Applied Math. Series 55, Tenth Printing, 1972, page 831.
program: for n in (0..10): print([A339033(n, k) for k in (0..n)])
for p in Partitions(n, max_part=k, inner=[k], length=n+1-k):
results.author: _Peter Luschny_, Nov 20 2020
